title: GTA+
headline: GTA+
subtitle: Declasse Impaler LX
content:
GTA+ Members can claim the new Declasse Impaler LX for free through January 10.

Pull up and flex in the new Declasse Impaler LX, a thick, performance-first muscle car that recalls a grittier time in Los Santos’ history. Ditch the bells and whistles and embrace the open road in this purist’s rendition of a classic.

GTA+ Membership automatically renews monthly, cancel any time. Visit rsg.ms/gtaplus for more info.
button: Select to sign up to GTA+
